name: Trollpacking
description: Ketil is 12 years old when his grandmother dies and leaves him a map and a magical backpack. The map sends him on a journey by boat which leads him right into a great storm. The storm causes him to shipwreck on an island with a giant mountain that resembles a troll. On the coast close to where a river goes into the ocean, he finds a crying troll baby which probably ended up there by the same storm. Ketil puts the baby troll in his backpack and starts climbing up the mountain, hoping to find the troll’s family.
